name: Cold Cold Heart
comments: Interesting take... I guess I've heard too many really great versions of this.
Enchanting
meltingly delicious
doesn't feel cold - makes feel warm and cuddly.
souvent et sexy! très lisse
Soft and Sexy! Very Smooth
O wind on the waterfall,and the leaves' laughter!
love when that faint guitar comes in towards the end...
Nobody can sing it like Norah Jones she has a sultry voice that captivates the heart and mind no matter if your heart Is a "Cold Cold Heart"
Gänsehautstimme...fantastisch...
NICE SONG.
Very well done cover.
I am not completely sure on the facts, but I heard in the grape vine that she and her father reunited a few years ago.... good thing
She is my future-ex wife!!!!!   Not really... But lordy is she a beautiful woman.... with an incredible voice....!!!
my future wife................well here's to wishing.
The lyrics are amazingly sad, but the musical arrangements are amazingly sweet!  Such a beautiful song!
I may live in a Freezer but I certainly don't have a Cold Cold Heart - Like this jazzy number.
Love Norah Jones
Could listen to her all day, everyday. to be honest :)
